docs.snippet: A presidential commission on Friday made 16 urgent recommendations to improve the nation's cybersecurity, including creating a nutritional-type label to help consumers shop wisely and appointing a new international ambassador on the subject &#8212...
docs.lead_paragraph: A presidential commission on Friday made 16 urgent recommendations to improve the nation's cybersecurity, including creating a nutritional-type label to help consumers shop wisely and appointing a new international ambassador on the subject — weeks before President-elect Donald Trump takes office.

headline.main: Panel Urges Better Cybersecurity to President-Elect Trump
headline.print_headline: Panel Urges Better Cybersecurity to President-Elect Trump

docs.snippet: Chinese President Xi Jinping told former U.S. Secretary of State Henry Kissinger on Friday that Beijing hopes for "stable and sustained" progress in ties with the U.S. following last month's American presidential election....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chinese President Xi Jinping told former U.S. Secretary of State Henry Kissinger on Friday that Beijing hopes for "stable and sustained" progress in ties with the U.S. following last month's American presidential election.

headline.main: Xi Tells Kissinger China Wants 'Stable' Progress With US

docs.snippet: Donald Trump's skeptics hope the presidency will reveal a serious side of the brash businessman. His supporters want him to keep the freewheeling style that rattled Washington....
